Lolcatfigletgnuplotprint
==========================

A simple commandline output utility package for printing simple messages and linear xy-plot data with colours and style

Usage
-------------------

.. code-block:: shell

    docker run -it --rm lsipii/lolcatfigletgnuplotprint --help

-------------------

    :alt: Example output
